content: Due to the lack of government support for sport, says Rafael Leitão, the professional chess player in Brazil has no financial stability at all. So, if you want to take chess seriously, you need to travel all the time to Europe and the United States to play in the big tournaments.
translations: ita:A causa della mancanza di sostegno del governo per lo sport, afferma Rafael Leitão, il giocatore di scacchi professionis
